title: London's mayor declares 'major incident' as omicron surges in U.K. capital
content:
1. London's mayor declares 'major incident' as omicron surges in U.K. capital  NBC News
  2. London declares 'major incident' to help COVID-hit hospitals  Reuters
  3. England Has Hundreds of Thousands of New Omicron Cases Daily  Bloomberg
  4. Omicron: Sadiq Khan declares major incident in London over ‘huge surge’ of cases  The Independent
  5. Sadiq Khan declares 'major incident' over Covid surge in London  Guardian News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 英国首都でオミクロンが急増、ロンドン市長が「重大事件」を宣言
伦敦市长宣布发生 "重大事件"，因为英国首都欧米茄的数量激增。
倫敦市長宣佈發生 "重大事件"，因爲英國首都歐米茄的數量激增。
